item.title: How does a web page work

CAN polyglots: A fancy way of attacking car networks
item.description: Some months ago, I wrote a Twitter thread about some CAN bus hacking shenanigans I did for my master thesis. I thought it would be interesting to share it on the blog too, so here it is.

item.title: Writing software for a sounding rocket
item.description: Skyward Experimental Rocketry has just released the on-board software of its sounding rocket - let’s talk about it!

item.title: About Me
item.description: I’m a (former) software engineer and (now) computer security Ph.D. student with an embedded systems background. My research interests include microarchitectural attacks, embedded & hardware security, program analysis, and anything at interface between hardware and software. I also like a bunch of other stuff, not necessarily related to computers. Experience Some cool things about me:
